title: Memory Cascade Uprising
outcome: The Memory Markets spark a cascade: Rada organizes a citywide event for residents to record and share uncensored life stories. The BCI system collapses under the flood of unpredictable data, forcing the city into a new era where human memory overwhelms machine control.

events.description: Rada launches the 'Memory Cascade,' urging all citizens to deposit personal stories, diaries, and memories in communal drop-boxes across Halden Zones.
Hundreds of thousands of stories are shared, overwhelming BCI’s risk analysis and freezing updates to compliance scores. Citizens notice privileges and restrictions remain unchanged.
The Council’s attempts to filter or delete the memory surge provoke outrage and further protest. Many citizens begin publicly disregarding BCI rules.
Manual, communal systems for housing assignments, food distribution, and dispute resolution emerge in several districts as residents realize BCI enforcements are nonfunctional.

The collapse of BCI’s authority leads to an explosion of cultural exchange, but also disorder. The city enters a tense, unpredictable phase—no one knows if this new freedom will foster unity or chaos.
